summary: Dr. Raichi, a survivor of the Tuffle race that was eliminated from Planet Vegeta by the Saiyans, is trying to take revenge on the surviving Saiyans by killing them and Earth's population. ... See full summary »
cast: Hisao Egawa|Toshio Furukawa|Ryô Horikawa|Takeshi Kusao|Ryûsei Nakao|Toku Nishio|Masako Nozawa|Shinji Ogawa|Tomiko Suzuki|Hiromi Tsuru|Naoko Watanabe|Jôji Yanami|Yûsaku Yara
title: Dragon Ball Z Gaiden: El plan para destruir a los Superguerreros
